description:

**Here's what's waiting for you**

Fantasy, Royal Romance, Dark Romance, Werewolf & luna, Supernatural, Dragon, Vampire, Billionaire, Mafia and so on. We got it all!

**Trending web novel at Litrad:**

- 「Annulled Love, Mafia's Fall: She Bulldozed All」

About Auto-Renewable Subscriptions
- Auto-renewable subscriptions in the app include Check-in Coins Packs.
- Coins Packs: $20, $30, $50 and $100.
- Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.
- Renewal: When you subscribe to check-in coins packs, your subscription will renew automatically. You'll be charged at the start of each billing cycle until you cancel your subscription. Subscriptions are automatically charged each billing period, whether monthly or another period, and you may be charged no more than 24 hours before the beginning of each billing period.
- Cancellation: You may cancel a subscription at any time more than 24 hours before your renewal date.

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Discover the best way to enjoy HD Movies 2025. explore trailers of new and trending movies

Looking for the latest in free streaming and movie trailers? We’ve got you covered with daily updates, smooth navigation every new release.

Key Features:

- Watch HD movie trailers anytime
- Discover new releases and upcoming hits
- Fast and easy to use – no sign-in required
- Get alerts for the latest movie trailers

This app is designed for true movie lovers who want quick access to trailers and updates without any hassle. Perfect for staying up to date with new movies and blockbusters in one place.

Pribacy policy:

https://peterjosephapps.blogspot.com/2025/08/privacy-policy.html

Terms:
https://peterjosephapps.blogspot.com/2025/08/terms.html

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows
- Quick search for movies and TV series by title
- Watch trailers and other videos
- Create your own watchlists for movies
- TV series calendar
- Detailed information about movies and TV series
- Rate Movies/TV shows in app and explore other rating
- Complete list of episodes for TV series with complete information about the episodes
- Search for services where you can buy, rent, stream films and series
- Watch videos (HD fullsreen) about movies and TV shows without leaving the app
- Profiles of actors with their full filmography
- Simple and user-friendly application interface
- Browsing history
- No account required

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

In this thrilling game, the player enters a mysterious play area after buying a ticket to try their luck on a slot machine. The machine has its own strange rules that must be followed carefully. Once the game begins, there is no way to pause or leave until all the goals are completed. If the player tries to escape, they will find that it’s impossible. 
As the tension builds, the player searches for the man who sold the ticket, but the counter is deserted. Suddenly, a phone rings — a stranger’s voice on the other end tells the player to complete the goals and find the key to escape. To survive, the player must buy another ticket, restart the slot machine, and collect all the required coins. Every spin could bring them closer to freedom or trap them forever. It’s up to the player to decide if they can outsmart the horrifying play area — or become part of it.

Москва — это огромный мир, где находится место всем: бизнесменам, чиновникам, звездам шоу-бизнеса, панкам, и блогерам. Здесь живут и работают лучшие умы России и сотни тысяч приезжих рабочих, здесь решается судьба всей страны и пишутся десятки миллионов личных историй. Для каждого Москва своя, особенная. Если ты двигаешься в темпе большого города — заходи к нам!

Актуальные новости Москвы, России и мира в одном приложении.

Explore the Past Like Never Before – Your Ultimate History Companion!

Step into the world of history with the most immersive and interactive history app available! Whether you’re a student, a trivia enthusiast, or just someone who loves the past, our app is designed to make learning history fun, engaging, and deeply informative. From ancient wonders to modern revolutions, this history encyclopedia has it all! Download now and start your journey through time.

Explore history every day with expertly curated insights, deep dives, and timeless knowledge. This history app offers a rich collection of history facts, biographies, and cultural insights, bringing the past to life through engaging storytelling and in-depth analysis.

Daily History & Encyclopedia-Style Learning
• Discover daily history updates, daily facts, today in history and daily random facts about pivotal events, legendary figures, and forgotten stories
• Browse a vast encyclopedia of history, culture, and philosophy, drawing inspiration from Wikipedia, history channel and other apps
• Explore timelines of civilizations, from the ancient world to the medieval era and beyond
• Gain insights from great thinkers like Socrates, Plato, and the Stoics, shaping your understanding of history and thought
• Discover the influence of art history, literature, and philosophy on human civilization

Exclusive History Content & Audio Vault
• Dive into detailed world history lessons covering ancient civilizations, medieval times, and modern events
• Explore art history, famous leaders, groundbreaking inventions, and pivotal wars
• Access a vast encyclopedia of historical knowledge, similar to Wiki, with expertly curated articles
• Listen to history podcasts and curated content similar to history hit and other apps
• Read compelling history stories from around the world, covering everything from Napoleon’s rise to the journeys of Marco Polo

Learn History & National Geographic with AI-Powered Exploration
• Expand your vocabulary and knowledge with learn words and historical terminology explanations
• Connect history with geography by tracing the movements of civilizations, explorers, and empires, paladin and more
• Ask our History AI any question and get instant, well-researched answers
• Chat with historical figures and experience interactive storytelling
• Get personalized recommendations based on your interests, just like a history vault of knowledge!

See real-world map locations of world history events -
• See on Apple Maps real world locations

History Quiz Weekly Series - Test Your Knowledge Every Week
• Every week features 4 themed categories with 10 fresh, curated questions each
• Categories span Wars & Battles, Exploration & Discovery, Science & Technology, Art & Culture, Leaders & Legends, and more
• Learn as you play with instant answer explanations
• Perfect for quick sessions you can finish in minutes, with real learning that sticks.

Whether you’re interested in culture, philosophy, or historical networks, this app provides a gateway to understanding the past. Just for today, start your journey into history.

Listening is more ENJOYABLE and PRODUCTIVE than reading.
Text To Speech: Audio Books is an AI technology that enables to convert and read aloud any text as speech imitative of the human voice. This app transforms text, books, document, PDF and online articles into audiobooks. Now you can stay informed while cooking, driving, work out, doing sports, commute and let Text To Speech work as a text reader for you.

Text To Speech - Audiobooks is an essential tool for all kinds of reader, especially for those who are busy and want to enjoy audiobooks or people with dyslexia and other reading difficulties. The app is like an audible book, it can read aloud any text, webpages, PDF, eBooks or text book to you with our high quality natural sounding voices.

FEATURE LIST:
• Listen to articles, PDF, digital text, or physical books AS AUDIO.
• Listen with 50+ high quality natural human voices and 20+ languages.
• Listen at any speed you like, even faster or slower 5x than usual speed.
• Scan physical book pages with your device camera and convert to audible text.
• Import internet articles and online news straight from your mobile browser.
• Upload and convert photo, PDF and Docs file from iCloud, Google Drive, Dropbox.
• Listen to audible text with your iOS iPhone and iPad
• Organize listening files with library
• Support multiple languages: English, Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Japanese, Italian, Russian, Dutch, Finnish, Swedish, Danish, Turkish, Polish, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Arabic, Hindi, Korean, Thai.


I. LISTEN TO ANY TEXT - IN ANYWHERE - AT ANYTIME:
Import PDF, photo of physical book pages, document, online articles, web pages or insert clipboard-copied text and let Text To Speech read aloud text to you in the natural human voice. Don't read anymore! Let's listen to your text!

II. +50 VOICES FOR BOTH MAN AND WOMEN, SUPPORTED 20 LANGUAGES:
Text To Speech provides more 50 high quality human voice across 20 languages. Just pick your favourite voice and find the perfect reading speed that works for you.

III. READ FASTER, REMEMBER LONGER
Text To Speech helps highlight each word as it reads. Listening and reading at the same time can maximize the levels of comprehension and help the reader remember longer than usual.

IV. SOLUTION FOR USERS WITH READING DYSLEXIA:
Text To Speech is a perfect solution for users with Dyslexia, ADHD, Low vision acuity, anxiety, concussions, and other reading disabilities to breeze through their readings and engage with their curiosities.


With Text To Speech : Audio Books, you can save time, retain more information, and stay focused. No matter what kind of reader you are, experience more with Text To Speech - Natural Reader.

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTIONS:

• Subscribed user can get access to Text To Speech Premium natural reading voices with unlimited uses.

• User can subscribe for one month (USD 19.99$) and one year (USD 99.99$) auto-renewing subscription.

• Unsubscribed users can only use those services with a limited quota per day.

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase

• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period

• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal

• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase

• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: http://vulcanlabs.co/privacy-policy/

Сканворды на русском языке без всяких сомнений уникальное явление в мире. Ни на каком другом языке вы не найдете столько литературных вопросов, вопросов с юмором, вопросов с контекстом происходящего в мире сегодня. И всё это в обычных кроссвордах, хотя, казалось бы, какая ерунда. Русский народ – народ слова. И любит своё слово, и держит своё слово, и относится к слову как к самому дорогому.

Сканворды в приложении разнообразные - попроще и посложнее, с фотографиями, с классическими вопросами или ассоциативными: «одним словом» либо «раз слово, два слово», как подсказки старца Фура. В любом журнале есть один англо-русский сканворд и один «дыркавнос», надеюсь, вы поймёте, почему его так назвали. На каждой странице вас встречает персонаж нашей весёлой семейки. Присоединяйтесь!

Все сканворды для читателя бесплатны. Это годовая коллекция: 52-53 номера по 20 сканвордов в каждом. Полный годовой арсенал сканвордов «съест» на телефоне около 50 Мбайт - картинки маленькие, текст - это текст. Мы ценим место на вашем телефоне.

Интернет для разгадывания не нужен. При условии, что сами сканворды уже на вашем телефоне. Каждую пятницу выходит новый номер журнала. Если вы оставили активной опцию «уведомление», то один раз в неделю в пятницу в 12-00 по местному времени придёт напоминание о новом номере. При входе в приложение загрузка нового журнала происходит автоматически и при её успешном завершении более не повторяется. Кроме того, можно загрузить или удалить на телефон поштучно любой из журналов, либо через «Настройки» скачать все журналы в один клик.

Основные возможности, в том числе доступ ко всем сканвордам, в приложении для читателя бесплатны. Банкет оплачивает рекламодатель. Ему разрешено иметь один узкий баннер на каждой странице + один показ межстраничной рекламы перед открытием сканворда. Наш рекламодатель не прерывает процесс разгадывания. Также рекламодатель щедро награждает читателя бесплатными подсказками за просмотр своих роликов. 

Любой читатель вправе, но не обязан, «перебить» рекламодателя, и: а) отключить рекламу навсегда, б) оформить подписку, которая на срок подписки отключает рекламу и даёт неограниченные подсказки, в) набрать подсказок на развес. Все эти возможности представлены на витрине в «Магазине».

Подписка - стандартный механизм Apple. 
1) Подписка возможна на три срока - неделя, месяц или год.
2) Подписка автоматически продлеваемая. Средства за возобновление подписки будут взиматься в течение 24 часов до конца текущего периода. 
3) Подписка подключается или отключается стандартно через iTunes, ссылка управления внизу. При желании отказаться от возобновления подписки пользователю необходимо это сделать не позднее, чем за 24 часа до конца текущего периода. При этом оплаченный период подписки отработает до конца. 

Политика конфиденциальности https://scanword.ru/privacy.html
Условия пользования https://scanword.ru/terms.html
Управление подпиской https://support.apple.com/ru-ru/HT202039

A PLAY Games é uma publicação mensal que concentra - há mais de dez anos - as maiores novidades, lançamentos, análises, dicas e curiosidades deste segmento. Sua especialidade são detonados, roteiros completos e minuciosos dos jogos mais populares da geração PlayStation.

Faça o download grátis da PLAY Games e compre edições avulsas ou assine diretamente do seu iPad, iPhone ou iPod Touch. 

• Assinatura auto-renovável PlayStation - Revista Oficial 

• Duração da assinatura e quantidade de edições enviadas durante a assinatura: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano (1 year subscription) – 12 edições 
• Assinatura de 6 meses (6 months subscription) – 6 edições 
• Assinatura de 1 mês (1 month subscription) – 1 edição 

• Preço da assinatura auto-renovável e edições avulsas: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano - Preço: US$ 30.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 6 meses - Preço: US$ 15.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 1 mês - Preço: US$ 2.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Edição avulsa – Preço: US$ 2.99 

• O pagamento será debitado da sua conta do iTunes no momento da confirmação da compra 

• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a renovação automática seja cancelada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período vigente 

• A renovação da sua assinatura será cobrada no prazo de 24 horas antes do final do período vigente e identificada o custo da renovação 

• As assinaturas podem ser gerenciados pelo usuário e a auto-renovação pode ser cancelada. Isso pode ser feito nas configurações da conta do usuário após a compra 

• Nenhum cancelamento da assinatura atual é permitida durante o período de assinatura vigente 

• Por favor, encontre nossos Termos e Condições e Política de Privacidade em: http://www.europanet.com.br/privacidade/ios/ 


Caso você seja assinante da revista impressa, basta entrar no app com seu e-mail e código de assinante para acessar suas revistas digitais gratuitamente. 

Qualquer dúvida, entre em contato com a nosso suporte técnico pelo e-mail: suportedigital@europanet.com.br

Цензор.НЕТ - Ваше джерело актуальних новин.

Завантажте офіційний додаток Цензор.НЕТ і будьте завжди в курсі подій в Україні та за її межами. Наш додаток надає швидкий доступ до важливих новин, аналітичних статей, ексклюзивних репортажів та глибоких розслідувань. Ми покриваємо широкий спектр тем, від політики та економіки до науки та культури, забезпечуючи вас надійною та актуальною інформацією.

Основні функції:

- Актуальні новини: Отримуйте останні новини з надійних достовірних джерел і будьте в курсі важливих подій.
- Багатомовність: Підтримка української, російської та англійської мов, дозволяє вам вибрати найзручнішу.
- Сповіщення: Налаштуйте push-сповіщення, щоб миттєво отримувати важливі новини та оновлення.
- Темна та світла теми: Виберіть зручний режим перегляду додатка залежно від умов освітлення або особистих переваг.
- Навігація та взаємодія: Легко переглядайте статті, фото та відеоматеріали.
- Бізнес.Цензор: Отримуйте спеціалізовані бізнес-новини та аналітику.

Чому Цензор.НЕТ?

Наш додаток розроблений з метою забезпечити швидкий доступ до якісної та перевіреної інформації. Ми прагнемо інформувати, надихати та залучати наших читачів до обговорення актуальних питань. З Цензор.НЕТ ви завжди будете знати більше, розуміти глибше та мислити ширше.

Everything you love about Vogue - anytime, anywhere. Get the news, shop the latest trends, and connect with fellow fashion obsessives from around the world with the Vogue app.

On the Vogue app, you can:
- Get the inside line on the top stories from Vogue editors.
- Engage with fellow fashion enthusiasts in discussions on your favorite topics.
- Shop editor-approved buys and the latest trends all within the app.
- Test your runway IQ with our daily Runway Genius quiz.
- Discover new topics to join the conversation across the globe.
- Never miss a story by following Vogue editors and contributors and exploring their latest posts.
- Take a front row seat at every international show.
- Explore our archive of 20,000+ fashion shows by designer, season, location and type
- Browse 1 million+ runway images— dating back to 1988—with AI-powered image search.
- Vote on your favorite looks, then see how your selects stack up to the Vogue community.
- Save looks and collections to your mood boards, with advanced organizational tools.
- Get a close-up look at all the details from Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, and so much more.
- Follow your favorite brands and topics so you never miss a Vogue moment.
- Share your favorite looks and collections with others via email, text, and social media.
- Browse thousands of photos capturing street style worldwide, shot by our renowned photographers.
- Read reviews from Vogue’s internationally recognized writers for our insider take.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited digital access to Vogue Runway. Users need to be logged in and subscribed to access Vogue Runway content. Get fearless, independent journalism with the Guardian app. Never miss breaking news, dive into diverse opinion pieces, and follow stories minute-by-minute with our dynamic live blogs - from world news and politics to business and sport. Get the following app exclusive features:

My Guardian - Your own custom feed of your favourite topics and writers, so you can follow the stories you care most about. 

Puzzles - Whether you're looking for classics like Soduku and Crosswords, or fun word games like Wordiply and Word wheel, we have the puzzle for you. 

Podcasts - Listen to our award-winning podcasts directly in the Guardian app. 
 
Listen to Articles - Can't read our articles? Listen to them instead. You can get realistic audio transcription of every article we publish - excluding live blogs. 

The Guardian news app is free to download and offers you a beautiful, intuitive mobile experience – so you can read, watch and listen to our independent reporting whenever and wherever it suits you. Readers have a limited number of articles, which refreshes on a regular basis. If you’re a regular reader, you might consider subscribing. Subscribing gives you full access to Guardian articles in our app, so you can read quality, international journalism with no restrictions.

And, when you subscribe, you’ll unlock:

Unlimited reading in the app, with no subscription messages
Ad-free reading, for an uninterrupted experience
Offline reading – download articles to explore on the go

What’s more, subscribing to our news app is a great way to show your support for fearless, independent Guardian journalism. As a reader-funded news organisation, we rely on your funding to power our future. Thank you.

All content in the Guardian app is copyright Guardian News & Media 2025. All rights reserved.

Avec « Le Parisien » suivez l’actualité locale, nationale et internationale en direct et en vidéo.

Retrouvez notre offre éditoriale : 
- L’actualité en continu : faits divers, pouvoir d’achat, société, santé, international 
- L’info locale : reportages près de chez vous, en Ile-de-France et dans l’Oise
- L’info sportive et les news du PSG avec les résultats et comptes-rendus de matchs 
- Les vidéos d’actu, Biclou sur le vélo et Food-checking sur l’alimentation
- Les podcasts Code source, Crime Story et Le Sacre qui décryptent l’actu, les affaires criminelles, etc.
- Nos sélections et critiques séries TV, cinéma, musique 

Avec plus de 400 journalistes, la rédaction du Parisien explore tous les terrains d’actualité, « du coin de la rue au bout du monde », de la politique à la météo, de l’économie au sport, en passant par l’info transports, immobilier et  environnement. Avec, à chaque fois, les mêmes préoccupations : proposer une information fiable et pratique, détecter les changements sociétaux avant les autres, démêler le vrai du faux, répondre à vos problèmes du quotidien, faire entendre votre voix. 

L'application Le Parisien offre une expérience d'information adaptée à vos  préférences, simple et efficace.

Découvrez nos fonctionnalités :
- Les notifications pour un accès rapide à vos centres d’intérêt
- Le choix de votre département 
- Le mode « sombre » et l’ajustement de la taille de la police
- L’enregistrement de vos articles favoris
- Le journal numérique dès 6h tous les matins 

Le Parisien abonnés :
Profitez de l’intégralité des actualités du Parisien avec l’abonnement 100% digital  et sans engagement.
- Accès aux articles exclusifs, enquêtes et analyses réservés aux abonnés 
- Une actu sans publicité
- Bénéficiez d’un espace de commentaires réservés aux abonnés
- Votre journal en avant-première : le journal papier en version numérique  dès 22h30 
- La synchronisation simple et rapide de votre abonnement sur l’application et sur notre site web grâce à un compte unique

Si vous êtes déjà abonné au journal Le Parisien, vous pouvez accéder à toutes les actus et au Journal numérique sur l’application. Il vous suffit de vous connecter avec vos identifiants.
 
L’abonnement et son renouvellement peuvent être gérés à partir des réglages de votre compte Apple. Votre abonnement est automatiquement reconduit sauf si cette option est désactivée dans les vingt-quatre heures précédant la fin de la période en cours. Le montant de l’abonnement est débité sur votre compte Apple à la confirmation de l’abonnement.


Prenez connaissance de nos conditions d’utilisation sur https://www.leparisien.fr/cgu/ et de notre politique de respect de la vie privée sur https://www.leparisien.fr/politique-confidentialite/
L’application évolue en permanence pour continuer à répondre au mieux à vos attentes. Des remarques, questions ou suggestions ? 
Écrivez-nous à mobiles@leparisien.fr

Inkitt Brings Stories to Life

Join Inkitt for the Community 
Dive into Inkitt, where stories, books, and novels come to life in a global community of readers and writers. Our readers are the trendsetters. Every day, millions of readers come to Inkitt to discover the next bestseller. Get feedback on your work, share your favorite science fiction or adventure stories, and explore a treasure trove of fantasy and romance novels. 

Unlimited Reading, A Library of Indie Novels Awaits
Enjoy unlimited reading across genres you love. From steamy romance to thrilling adventure, or captivating fantasy to provocative romance, there’s something for everyone:
Discover indie novels from promising writers
Explore a new niche like mafia romances, fantasy adventures, or your favorite fanfiction
Download books to read offline anytime
Personalize your experience with customizable fonts and colors
Autoscroll while immersed in your favorite stories

Become the Next Blockbuster 
Inkitt is the world’s first reader-powered publisher, connecting readers with new books, captivating novels, and extraordinary stories. Our platform is home to romance, adventure, and fantasy gems waiting to be discovered. Indie authors who shine can gain opportunities for publication or adaptations, making their books accessible to fans worldwide.

description:

关于程序内提供的「按月订阅」「按年订阅」功能：

您可以在程序内使用 iTunes 自动续订功能获取会员专属功能，我们提供「月度会员」「年度会员」套餐。

确认购买后，将会从您的 iTunes 帐户中收取费用。您可以在每个周期结束至少 24 小时前取消下个周期的订阅，每个周期结束 24 小时内将会自动续订，已订阅的周期将无法取消。
